thread.title: We can’t stop looking at these babies dressed up as Bernie Sanders - Life
thread.title_full: We can’t stop looking at these babies dressed up as Bernie Sanders - Life

author: boston.com
title: We can’t stop looking at these babies dressed up as Bernie Sanders - Life
text:
This election season, babies are jumping the wagon and feeling the Bern (with a little help from their parents).
World, meet #BabiesforBernie.
The hashtag is pouring into social media, with parents posting priceless photos of their children sporting Bernie Sanders gear and Bernie Sanders hair, Bernie glasses and buttons and stickers. It’s the cutest thing that has come out of the presidential race thus far.
Advertisement - Continue Reading Below Here are some of the most adorable Bernie babies we’ve seen. Moms and dads, keep ‘em coming.
#BabiesForBernie #BernieSanders Feel free to join the FB group if you think your baby is better off w Bernie for president: https://m.facebook.com/groups/1625585661022536?message_id=1625585757689193&ref=m_notif&notif_t=like&actorid=1070881440 #FeelTheBern
